name: Robot In My Rocket
description:
Story

Your job is to sort robots form humans to go on a spaceship so you can go to Mars. You are given X-Ray cards that show the skeleton of the person in front of you. This job is very important, and even the slightest mistake means your termination. How long can you last?

How to play

Left arrow- Send humans to the spaceship.

Right arrow- Send robots into space.

Click on your Employee Handbook for help on what is considered a human or robot

Game Jam

This was made for the PIGSquad Tabletop Jam and it barely fits the theme other than the X-Ray Cards. I spent only a couple hours on this for several reasons. This is defiantly the worst game in the jam. Still, I hope everyone gets some sort of enjoyment out of this!
